en.title: Electrician Management System | PraticOS
en.description: Stop losing quotes and undercharging! Work order system for electricians with price calculator, scheduling and financial control. Professionalize your service in 5 minutes.
en.keywords: electrician software, electrician management system, work order system electrician, electrician app, electrical service management
en.ogDescription: Stop losing quotes and undercharging! WO system with price calculator, scheduling and financial control. Professionalize your service.

hero.title: Stop undercharging:
hero.subtitle: Stop guessing prices and losing money. Professional quotes in seconds, cost calculator to ensure profit and customer tracking on their phone.

problems.title: Do you face
problems.subtitle: Common pain points for electrical service professionals

items.title: Don't know how to price
items.text: Guess prices and later find out you worked for free. Don't know how to calculate materials + labor + profit.

items.title: Quotes take too long
items.text: Customer asks for a quote and you take hours to make it. Meanwhile, they already hired another electrician.

items.title: Mixing personal money
items.text: Income and expenses all together. At month's end you don't know if you made profit or loss.

items.title: No schedule control
items.text: Forget appointments, double-book services. Lose customers due to lack of organization.

items.title: Customer disappears after quote
items.text: Make detailed quotes but less than 50% close. No time to follow up.

items.title: Competition from handymen
items.text: Lose jobs to unqualified workers charging cheap. Can't show your differential.

solutions.title: How
solutions.subtitle: Features designed for daily electrician operations

items.title: Price calculator
items.text: Automatically calculate materials + labor + profit margin.
items.highlight: Never work at a loss again.

items.title: Quote in 2 minutes
items.text: Create professional quotes quickly. Customer receives on WhatsApp and approves instantly.

items.title: Schedule with reminders
items.text: Organize your jobs and receive automatic reminders. Never miss an appointment again.

items.title: Materials list
items.text: Record all materials used. Inventory and cost control in one place.

items.title: Separate financial control
items.text: See exactly what came in and out of the business.

items.title: Link for customer tracking
items.text: Customer tracks service status on their phone. Professionalism that impresses.

checklist.title: Complete
checklist.text: Create detailed quotes that impress customers and increase your conversion rate. All organized and professional.

items.text: Detailed service description
Materials list with prices
Itemized labor
Total with profit margin
Execution timeline
Customer digital acceptance

features.title: Everything you need to
features.subtitle: Powerful and intuitive tools to boost your revenue

items.title: Digital WO
items.text: Create complete work orders with photos, materials and values. All organized.

items.title: Cost Calculator
items.text: Calculate the right price considering materials, time and desired profit.

items.title: Professional PDF
items.text: Generate quotes and receipts in PDF. Professionalism that closes more jobs.

items.title: Financial Control
items.text: See how much you billed, received and have to receive. Complete dashboard.

items.title: Smart Schedule
items.text: Organize your schedule and receive reminders. Never miss an appointment.

items.title: Tracking Link
items.text: Customer tracks service status on their phone. No need to call.

testimonial.quote: Before I was guessing prices and many times worked at a loss. Now I calculate everything correctly and know exactly my profit. Customers praise the professionalism of the quotes.
testimonial.name: Carlos Eduardo

faq.title: Frequently asked
faq.subtitle: Get your questions answered before you start

items.question: Do I need to pay to use it?
items.answer: No! The free plan is real and has no time limit. You can use it forever with up to 30 photos/month. Our pricing is transparent and you don't need to talk to a salesperson.

items.question: How does the price calculator work?
items.answer: You register your costs (materials, travel) and set your profit margin. The system automatically calculates the final price ensuring you don't work at a loss.

items.question: Can I control my schedule?
items.answer: Yes! PraticOS has an integrated schedule with reminders. You organize all jobs and receive notifications so you never forget an appointment.

items.question: Does it work for freelancers and companies?
items.answer: Yes! The system adapts for both freelance electricians and electrical service companies with teams.

items.question: What if I need help?
items.answer: We have email support and complete documentation. We respond within 24 business hours. Our team understands the electrician's reality.

download.title: Download now and start
download.text: Available for iOS and Android. Start free!

contact.title: Need
contact.subtitle: Our team is ready to assist you
